connectDevice

public boolean connectDevice()
Insures single connection Handles all necessaries handleDisconnect() & handleConnect() calls Inherits checks for expired characteristic requests, missing remote Rssi feeds etc

Returns:
true if nothing to do. false when connection handling in process
